title: Tech Startups Seek to Shield Ukrainian Workers, Operations
sub_head: Some venture firms are helping portfolio-company employees evacuate after Russian invasion
body:
Technology startups with operations in Ukraine are finding ways to be resilient after the Russian attack on the country.
London-based Flashpoint Venture Capital, which invests in startups formed by founders from areas such as Central and Eastern Europe, the Commonwealth of Independent States, and Israel, has five or six portfolio companies with employees in Ukraine, said co-founder Michael Szalontay.
